rules_text:
Create two 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance.
[i]Storycraft[/i] – Put an indestructible counter onto target legendary creature you control if you control three or more enchantments.
flavor_text: [i]“Do not falter now, remember those that fell before us, and those that turned against us.” - Paladrin, Hero of Certhin[/i]
